cyclone.name: ISAIAS
cyclone.current_location: about 100 miles ESE of Jacksonville Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north then north-northeast and expected to track up the Carolina coast toward the Mid-Atlantic and Northeast U.S.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the coast of northeastern South Carolina or southern North Carolina

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: Watch Hill Rhode Island to Stonington Maine, including Martha’s Vineyard, Nantucket and Block Island
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Flagler/Volusia County Line FL northward to South Santee River SC; Hurricane Warning South Santee River SC to Surf City NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Entire U.S. East Coast from Florida through New England
weather_observation.wind: Brief gusty winds below tropical-storm strength possible; sustained TS winds not expected at the port
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge less than 1 ft possible due to swell
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–2 inches of rain possible as outer rainbands brush South Florida
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along Palm Beach County beaches
